     * New Jersey

     * Barbara Buono
   By Caryn Shinske May 26, 2013

Barbara Buono TV ad goes after Chris Christie on jobs, property taxes

   Depending on who’s asked, everything in Jersey is just dandy or the state
   is on the brink of economic disaster.

Christie tell it, everything in New Jersey is going just
   fine," Buono claims in the ad released online Wednesday.

In the ad Buono says that New Jersey has one of the worst jobless rates in
   the country, but text in the ad also claims the state ranks 44th
   nationwide in job creation.

Buono is right that nearly 400,000 New Jerseyans are out of work, but
   fewer people are unemployed now than when Christie became governor.
